languages.text: {n}Махарий переводит растерянный взгляд с супруги на Абеляра и обратно. Жесткость и надменность из его позы улетучились, не оставив и следа.{/n} "Регина... ты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Махарий переводит растерянный взгляд с супруги на Абеляра и обратно. Жесткость и надменность из его позы улетучились, не оставив и следа.{/n} "Регина... ты?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий переводит растерянный взгляд с супруги на Абеляра и обратно. Жесткость и надменность из его позы улетучились, не оставив и следа.{/n} "Регина... ты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius shifts his confused eyes from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The cruelty and arrogance have vanished from his pose without a trace.{/n} "Regina... You?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは困惑のまなざしを妻からアベラルドへ移し、再び妻へと戻す。その姿勢からは、堅苦しい傲慢さは消えていた。{/n}「レジーナ…お前が？」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは困惑のまなざしを妻からアベラルドへ移し、再び妻へと戻す。マハリウスの冷酷かつ傲慢な態度は、跡形もなく消えていた。{/n}「レジーナ…お前が？」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克困惑地看了一眼他的妻子，又看了一眼阿贝拉德，然后又看了一眼他的妻子。他愣在那里，嚣张的气焰消失无踪。{/n}“蕾吉娜……是你？”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯困惑地看了一眼他的妻子，又看了一眼阿贝拉德，然后又看了一眼他的妻子。他退后两步，身上残酷与嚣张的气焰消失无踪。{/n}“蕾吉娜……是你？”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Complètement abasourdi, Sauerback regarde tour à tour sa femme et Abélard, toute trace de cruauté et d'arrogance disparue.{/n} « Régina... C'était toi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Complètement abasourdi, Macharius regarde tour à tour sa femme et Abélard, toute trace de cruauté et d'arrogance disparue.{/n} « Régina... C'était toi ? »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback alterna su mirada confusa entre su mujer y Abelard. La rígida arrogancia ha desaparecido de su postura por completo.{/n} «Regina... ¿tú?».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius alterna su mirada confusa entre su mujer y Abelard. La crueldad y la arrogancia han desaparecido de su cuerpo sin dejar rastro.{/n} «Regina... ¿tú?».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback blickt mit verwirrten Augen von seiner Gemahlin zu Abelard und wieder zurück. Die steife Arroganz ist aus seiner Haltung verschwunden.{/n} "Regina ... Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius blickt mit verwirrten Augen von seiner Gemahlin zu Abelard und wieder zurück. Die Grausamkeit und Arroganz sind spurlos aus seiner Haltung verschwunden.{/n} "Regina ... Ihr?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback; şaşkın bakışlarını önce eşinden Abelard'a, sonra tekrar eşine çeviriyor. Duruşundaki o bayağı kibirden eser yok.{/n} "Regina... Sen ha?"
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback shifts his confused gaze from his wife to Abelard, then back again. The stiff arrogance has vanished from his posture.{/n} "Regina... You?"
